name: Realm of Forms
description:
Walk up to the computer to interact with it and program within the Realm of Forms.  Hit the [?] key for some quick help info.  This is going to be a way for children to learn how to program in a friendly environment.  It uses the Lua Programming Language.

  • http://www.lua.org/
  • https://www.tutorialspoint.com/lua/index.htm

This project is still very very early, but we'll be working on it.
